$listeners.desc: All native events are being propagated (you don't need the '.native' modifier)

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

text-color.desc: Overrides text color (if needed); Color name from the Quasar Color Palette

floating.desc: Tell QBadge if it should float to the top right side of the relative positioned parent element or not

transparent.desc: Applies a 0.8 opacity; Useful especially for floating QBadge

multi-line.desc: Content can wrap to multiple lines

label.desc: Badge's content as string; overrides default slot if specified

outline.desc: Use 'outline' design (colored text and borders only)

default.desc: This is where QBadge content goes, if not using 'label' property
